objects.text:
• Japanese Quartz Movement
• Stainless Steel Construction
• Chronograph Function
• Water Resistant (3ATM)

product_details.description: ⌚Movement: Japanese imported quartz analog movement and battery, provide precise time and long-term running. The watch can be used for more than 1 years. ⌚Material: The strap is made of stainless steel, comfortable and soft and breathable. Mineral glasses, 304 steel case, Suit for all kinds of occasions. ⌚Sports chronograph: Multifunctional sub-dial can work, chronograph, calendar, run seconds. Provide you with multi-function purpose use. ⌚3ATM waterproof: This watch is waterproof 30m, can withstand daily splash or short immersion in water, but not swimming and showering, diving or snorkeling. ☎After sales service: Each product has 1-year after sales service. If you have any questions about the product, please contact me immediately and we will give you a satisfactory solution. Item width - 4.2 centimeters ** Clasp type - Push Button Foldover Clasp With Safety ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
This banner prominently features a luxury wristwatch, combining bold typography and a sleek dark aesthetic. The background features a gradient with deep charcoal and black tones, layered with subtle geometric shapes, circles, and panels for dimension. The primary headline (`heading`) is written in large, bold, golden-yellow typography to catch attention, while the subheading (`subheading`) below it contrasts in a strong white serif font. Informational bullet points (`description`) are aligned on the left in a clean, white sans-serif text block. The price (`price`) is displayed in a large bold font using the golden highlight color. Below it, a golden call-to-action button (`cta_button`) paired with black text (`cta`) invites immediate shopping. The watch image (`product_image`) on the right balances the layout and stands out with high contrast and polish.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #1A1A1A (Charcoal Black)
- Gradient Overlay: #2C2C2C to #121212
- Highlight Gold: #D4AF37
- Text White: #FFFFFF
- Button Text: #000000
product_color: The product image of the wristwatch presents a sleek, modern aesthetic with a monochromatic black and gray color palette. The dominant colors include metallic black (#1C1C1C) for the case and band, and gradient gunmetal gray (#4F4F4F to #A9A9A9) for the dial face. Subtle use of silver (#C0C0C0) highlights the subdials, hands, and index markers, creating contrast and a sense of depth. The gradient blending of gray adds sophistication while maintaining a minimalist look. For advertisement banners, a palette of #1C1C1C, #4F4F4F, #A9A9A9, #C0C0C0, and white (#FFFFFF) would evoke elegance and modern appeal effectively.
